description.narrative: Målet med projektet är att delta i den fortsatta utvecklingen av ett hållbart statistiskt system i Burkina Faso. Detta projekt är en fortsättning av den första fasen som genomfördes 2008-2012. Den statistik som tillgängliggörs ska fylla det nationella informationsbehovet om utvecklingen inom olika sektorer samt erbjuda mätvärden för att följa utvecklingen av fattigdomsbekämpningen.

The goal is to participate in the further development of a sustainable statistical system in Burkina Faso. The project is a continuation of the first phase which took place 2008-2012. The statistics made available aims to fill the national need for information on developments in various sectors, and provide values for monitoring trends in poverty reduction.

The project objective is to contribute to the development of a sustainable statistical system in Burkina Faso that facilitates decision-making based on relevant and reliable statistical information that meet domestic demands, supports the implementation and the monitoring of the national development programme e.g. the Strategy for Accelerated Growth and Sustainable Development (SCADD) and the Millennium Development Goals (MDG). The project specific objectives are to assist in the development of prioritised statistics (economics, social and environment), to reinforce the general statistical capacities and IT system at the Institute and in the NSS which will lead to the production of statistics that will to a greater extent satisfy the national and international needs. More specifically, a large part of the assistance is dedicated towards the development of the continuous multipurpose survey (MCS), the improvement of management techniques and the tools and the harmonisation of IT infrastructures at the Institute. The development of the statistical business register and improvement of gender, demographic and environmental statistics have also been perceived as important development key areas. Other components are related to the general capacity building such as trainings in the English language, IT and statistical software, report writing/presentation and in survey methodology. INSD’s regional offices will also be assisted during the Project period.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: From September 2012 to March 2017, the following main result areas can be highlighted: - The existence of the management guide and provisions to institutionalize it - Strengthening skills, including training ten (18) participants in three (03) levels of survey theory as well as strengthening many staff members in data processing and analysis with specific software - Technical support for the implementation of the EMC survey including planning, production, publication and wide dissemination of results, including statistics on poverty - The publication of the results of the EMC within the required deadlines (i.e. 13 months against a target of 15 months) - The development and publication of gender statistics (yearbook on gender statistics, 2013 and 2014 editions, dashboard on gender statistics, 2013 and 2014 editions, 3rd edition of the women and men booklet in Burkina Faso) - The development of a technical document on demographic projections and the development of demographic projections for two regions of Burkina Faso - Strengthening of environment statistics (development of the database and manual on indicators) - Continuous improvement of the statistical business register (SBR)
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
